attributes.action: Re-open the community centres for the children in cities.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the slogan to be... "Save the Children from a 'gang related' fate".
attributes.background: I believe that the children (especially in cities) have had their option to do something good with their spare time taken away by the closure of the 'community centres' resulting in more of them falling into a 'gang related' life, often resulting in them falling into a gang related fate.

rejection.details: Decisions about local community centres are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or House of Commons, but we have published a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding to local authorities for youth clubs, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585777
